content: important there is a little mistake on the first amor-plate work r14-19 like instructions - not only r14 then follow instructions from r20 on like pattern calls i created this pattern for my little bro who like some tank slippers first published on december 2019 - with some erratas for joyce i had hook some bigfoot version in size eu 47 and write a pattern for this size slightly_smiling_face so i write 3 complete updated versions all for a 9 wpi aran yarn please note be aware of your yarn- and shoesize - the whole pattern stitches has to correct by using another yarn or sole size the sole was inspired by the lovely diy tutoria by andrea kutsch unfortunatly no longer available if you are not sure cause of the sizes or if there is any question please feel free to contact me and please show me your project and project pictures heart_exclamation i ´ll love to see it
